name: Idle Dentist! Simulator Games
description:
Visiting a Dental Clinic was never a fun experience, until now! Idle Dentist mobile game combines a lot of popular and familiar relaxing mechanics. If you enjoy playing doctor games, this is the right fit for you.

It is not a typical Hospital Tycoon game. You are in charge of the whole teeth care business, provide medical care for your patients and earn money. Treat tooth by tooth, do surgery when necessary, cavities, braces to make a bling smile for each one of your customers. We have also implemented small ASMR mini-games so that the game feels like a real doctor simulator. Hire the best dentist for each dental room. Don't forget about the assistants who help your doctors to work faster.

What are the features that make Idle Dentist the best idle simulation in the market:
- Provide the best healthcare for your patients to make sure you have a high review score;
- Grow your clinic by opening new sectors and rooms;
- Provide X-rays for each customer to identify pain sources;
- Hire doc for each dental room;
- Upgrade all individual items to provide the best medical care for your clients;
- Treat patients faster by playing 3d mini doctor games where you are the dr in charge;

Play this addictive medical tycoon game and have fun! If you have any questions or suggestions feel free to contact us anytime.
